body.p:
My name is Martín Russo and I live in Córdoba, Argentina. I am a web developer interested in building applications. I am looking for my first job as a web developer, since I was a child I have been in contact with computers and I have not stopped learning. 

 So far, my skills are: 

 HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, TypeORM, Sequelize, GraphQL, Apollo, React, Git.
